mapper.insert: insert into daily_seat (daily_seat_id, date, train_code, carriage_index, type, `row`, `col`, number, state) values (#{dailySeatId}, #{date}, #{trainCode}, #{carriageIndex}, #{type}, #{row}, #{col}, #{number}, #{state})
mapper.update: update daily_seat set state = #{state} where daily_seat_id = #{dailySeatId}
mapper.delete: delete from daily_seat where date = #{date} and train_code = #{trainCode} and carriage_index = #{carriageIndex}
mapper.select: select count(*) from daily_seat where date = #{date} and train_code = #{trainCode} and type = #{type} and state like #{pattern}
